symlink_test.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .bashrc
Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .bash_profile
Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .profile
Ensure Passwords Are Not Stored in the Global Configuration

sql57_test.comment: Ensure validate password plugin is loaded
Ensure length is configured to at least 14
Ensure mixed case count is less than or equal to 1
Ensure number count is less than or equal to 1
Ensure password policy is set to STRONG
Ensure special character count is less than or equal to 1
Ensure block_encryption_mode is set to aes 256
Ensure MySQL is bound to at least one IP
Ensure connection_control_failed_connections_threshold is greater than or equal to 5
Ensure connection_control_min_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 60000
Ensure connection_control_max_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 1920000

file_test.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'slow_query_log' File are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_test.comment: Ensure slow query log is set to OFF

file_test.comment: Ensure permissions on 'relay_log_basename' files are '660' or More Restrictive
Ensure Permissions On 'general_log_file' File are '600' or More Restrictive

sql57_test.comment: Ensure SSL Key and Certificate Files are configured
Ensure a path is not included in SSL Key File values

file_test.comment: Ensure Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files without Path Info in the Data Directory are '400'
Ensure Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files with Path Info are '400'
Ensure Permissions On 'plugin_dir' are '554' or More Restrictive

sql57_test.comment: Ensure Example or Test Databases do not exist
Ensure 'secure_file_priv' is not an empty string
Ensure 'validate_password_length' is greater than or equal to '14'
Ensure 'validate_password_mixed_case_count' is less than or equal to '1'
Ensure 'validate_password_number_count' is less than or equal to '1'
Ensure 'validate_password_special_char_count' is less than or equal to '1'
Ensure 'host' is not equal to '%' for all users
Ensure 'ssl_type' is not blank for any user
Ensure slow query log is set to ON

symlink_object.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

password_object.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

textfilecontent54_object.comment: Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .bashrc
Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .bash_profile
Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .profile
Ensure Passwords Are Not Stored in the Global Configuration

sql57_object.comment: Ensure validate password plugin is loaded
Ensure dictionary file is configured
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password_dictionary_file');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure length is configured to at least 14
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password_length');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure mixed case count is less than or equal to 1
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password_mixed_case_count');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure number count is less than or equal to 1
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password_number_count');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure password policy is set to STRONG
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password_policy');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure special character count is less than or equal to 1
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password_special_char_count');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure block_encryption_mode is set to aes 256
Ensure MySQL is bound to at least one IP
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'bind_address';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'ssl_cipher' is configured correctly
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='ssl_cipher';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure connection controls are active
sql57_object.sql: SELECT PLUGIN_NAME, PLUGIN_STATUS FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PLUGINS WHERE PLUGIN_NAME LIKE 'connection%';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure connection_control_failed_connections_threshold is greater than or equal to 5
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME LIKE 'connection_control_failed_connections_threshold';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure connection_control_min_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 60000
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME LIKE 'connection_control_min_connection_delay';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure connection_control_max_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 1920000
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME LIKE 'connection_control_max_connection_delay';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure '750:mysql:mysql' Permissions On 'datadir'
Ensure '660:mysql:mysql' permissions on 'log_bin_basename' files
Ensure '660:mysql:mysql' Permissions On 'log_error' File

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'slow_query_log' File are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'slow_query_log' File are '660' or More Restrictive
Ensure slow query log is set to OFF
Ensure 'slow_query_log_file' does not exist

file_object.comment: Ensure permissions on 'relay_log_basename' files are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure permissions on 'relay_log_basename' files are '660' or More Restrictive

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'general_log_file' File are '600' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'general_log_file' File are '600' or More Restrictive
Ensure SSL Key and Certificate Files are configured
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME RLIKE '^.*ssl_(ca|capath|cert|crl|crlpath|key)$' AND VARIABLE_VALUE <> '';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure a path is not included in SSL Key File values
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME RLIKE '^.*ssl_(ca|capath|cert|crl|crlpath|key)$' AND VARIABLE_VALUE <> '';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files without Path Info in the Data Directory are '400'

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files without Path Info in the Data Directory are '400'
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME RLIKE '^.*ssl_(ca|capath|cert|crl|crlpath|key)$' AND VARIABLE_VALUE <> '';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files with Path Info are '400'

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files with Path Info are '400'
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM information_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME RLIKE '^.*ssl_(ca|capath|cert|crl|crlpath|key)$' AND VARIABLE_VALUE <> '';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'plugin_dir' are '554' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'plugin_dir' are '554' or More Restrictive
Ensure Example or Test Databases do not exist
sql57_object.sql: SELECT * FROM information_schema.SCHEMATA where SCHEMA_NAME not in ('mysql','information_schema', 'sys', 'performance_schema');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'local_infile' is 'OFF'
Ensure 'have_symlink' is 'DISABLED'
Ensure 'daemon_memcached' is disabled
Ensure 'secure_file_priv' is not an empty string
Ensure 'sql_mode' contains 'STRICT_ALL_TABLES'
Ensure 'log_error' is not empty
Ensure not root (`/`), `/var`, or `/usr`
Ensure 'log_warnings' is set to '2'
Ensure 'old_passwords' is set to '0'
Ensure 'secure_auth' is set to 'ON'
Ensure 'sql_mode' contains 'NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER'
Ensure All Users Have Passwords
sql57_object.sql: SELECT User,host FROM mysql.user WHERE (plugin IN('mysql_native_password', 'mysql_old_password','') AND (LENGTH(Password) = 0 OR Password IS NULL)) OR (plugin='sha256_password' AND LENGTH(authentication_string) = 0);

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'validate_password_length' is greater than or equal to '14'
Ensure 'validate_password_mixed_case_count' is less than or equal to '1'
Ensure 'validate_password_number_count' is less than or equal to '1'
Ensure 'validate_password_special_char_count' is less than or equal to '1'
Ensure 'validate_password_policy' is set to 'STRONG'
Ensure 'validate_password_dictionary_file' is configured
Ensure 'host' is not equal to '%' for all users
sql57_object.sql: SELECT user, host FROM mysql.user WHERE host = '%';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure no anonymous accounts exist
sql57_object.sql: SELECT user,host FROM mysql.user WHERE user = '';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'have_ssl' is set to 'YES'
Ensure 'ssl_type' is not blank for any user
sql57_object.sql: SELECT user, host, ssl_type FROM mysql.user WHERE NOT HOST IN ('::1', '127.0.0.1', 'localhost') AND ssl_type != 'ANY' AND ssl_type != 'X509' AND ssl_type != 'SPECIFIED';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'ssl_verify_server_cert' Is Set To '1'
Ensure 'master_info_repository' is set to 'TABLE'
Ensure slow query log is set to ON
Ensure 'slow_query_log' file does not exist
Ensure general_log is set to 0
Ensure 'general_log' file does not exist
Ensure 'super_priv' equals 'N' for 'repl' user
Ensure 'repl' does not use '%' for 'host'

symlink_state.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

password_state.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

Ensure block_encryption_mode is set to aes 256
Ensure MySQL is bound to at least one IP
Ensure 'ssl_cipher' is configured correctly
Ensure connection controls are active
Ensure connection_control_failed_connections_threshold is greater than or equal to 5
Ensure connection_control_min_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 60000
Ensure connection_control_max_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 1920000

sql57_state.comment: Ensure Example or Test Databases do not exist
Ensure 'local_infile' is 'OFF'
Ensure 'have_symlink' is 'DISABLED'
Ensure 'secure_file_priv' is not an empty string
Ensure 'sql_mode' contains 'STRICT_ALL_TABLES'
Ensure 'log_error' is not empty

Ensure 'log_warnings' is set to '2'

Ensure 'master_info_repository' is set to 'TABLE'
Ensure slow query log is set to ON
Ensure general_log is set to 0
